items.name: static var abs: BNNSActivationFunction
items.desc: An activation function that returns the absolute value of its input.

items.name: static var clamp: BNNSActivationFunction
items.desc: An activation function that returns its input clamped to a specified range.

items.name: static var identity: BNNSActivationFunction
items.desc: An activation function that returns its input.

items.name: static var integerLinearSaturate: BNNSActivationFunction
items.desc: An activation function that returns an arithmetic shift, preserving sign.

items.name: static var integerLinearSaturatePerChannel: BNNSActivationFunction
items.desc: An activation function that returns an arithmetic shift, preserving sign for each channel.

items.name: static var leakyRectifiedLinear: BNNSActivationFunction
items.desc: An activation function that returns its input when that is greater than or equal to zero, otherwise it returns its input multiplied by a specified value.

items.name: static var linear: BNNSActivationFunction
items.desc: An activation function that returns its input multiplied by a specified value.

items.name: static var rectifiedLinear: BNNSActivationFunction
items.desc: An activation function that returns its input when that is greater than or equal to zero, otherwise it returns zero.

items.name: static var scaledTanh: BNNSActivationFunction
items.desc: An activation function that returns the scaled hyperbolic tangent of its input.

items.name: static var sigmoid: BNNSActivationFunction
items.desc: An activation function that returns the sigmoid function of its input.

items.name: static var softmax: BNNSActivationFunction
items.desc: An activation function that returns the softmax function of its input.

items.name: static var tanh: BNNSActivationFunction
items.desc: An activation function that returns the hyperbolic tangent of its input.
